form_data.form_description: Extract interventions and their associated outcomes from clinical trial papers

fields.example: Randomized controlled trial of oral rinse for plaque reduction
fields.extraction_hints: Look in the title, abstract, or introduction section

fields.field_description: List of interventions tested in the study. Each intervention should include name, type, and dosage if available
fields.example: Drug A: 10mg twice daily, Placebo: matching tablets
fields.extraction_hints: Look in methods section, intervention description. Extract all interventions mentioned

fields.field_description: List of outcomes measured in the study. Include primary and secondary outcomes with their results if available
fields.example: Primary: Plaque index reduction (mean 0.45, SD 0.12). Secondary: Gingival bleeding (reduced by 30%)
fields.extraction_hints: Look in results section, outcomes table, or methods section where outcomes are pre-specified
Look in methods section, participant flow, or results section

decomposition.reasoning_trace:
Step 1: Field Inventory
- Found 4 fields in form_data
- 3 text fields: study_title, interventions, outcomes
- 1 numeric field: total_participants
- 0 enum fields, 0 boolean fields, 0 aggregation fields

Step 2: Cognitive Behavior Analysis
- Text extractions: study_title (extract title from document), interventions (extract intervention details from methods), outcomes (extract outcome results from results section)
- Numeric extractions: total_participants (extract participant count from methods/results)
- All fields are independent direct extractions from the document
- No aggregation or synthesis fields present

Step 3: Grouping Decision
- Created 2 signatures by grouping fields with same cognitive behavior
- ExtractTextualFields: Groups all 3 text extraction fields (study_title, interventions, outcomes)
- ExtractNumericFields: Contains the 1 numeric extraction field (total_participants)
- No dependencies needed as all fields extract directly from document

Step 4: Verification
- All 4 fields covered
- No duplicates
- No dependencies (all independent extractions)
- Minimized to 2 signatures following aggressive grouping strategy

study_title.example: Randomized controlled trial of oral rinse for plaque reduction
study_title.extraction_hints: Look in the title, abstract, or introduction section

interventions.field_description: List of interventions tested in the study. Each intervention should include name, type, and dosage if available
interventions.example: Drug A: 10mg twice daily, Placebo: matching tablets
interventions.extraction_hints: Look in methods section, intervention description. Extract all interventions mentioned

outcomes.field_description: List of outcomes measured in the study. Include primary and secondary outcomes with their results if available
outcomes.example: Primary: Plaque index reduction (mean 0.45, SD 0.12). Secondary: Gingival bleeding (reduced by 30%)
outcomes.extraction_hints: Look in results section, outcomes table, or methods section where outcomes are pre-specified

total_participants.extraction_hints: Look in methods section, participant flow, or results section
